author: Alicia Lee, CNN
title: New children's book tells the story of Dr. Li Wenliang, who sounded the alarm on coronavirus
description: A new children's book follows the story of the late Dr. Li Wenliang, who sounded the alarm on the virus in China before dying from it himself.
content:
(CNN)A new children's book follows the story of the late Dr. Li Wenliang, who sounded the alarm on the virus in China before dying from it himself. 
The book, titled "Dr. Li and the crown-wearing virus," is written by Francesca Cavallo, a New York Times best… [+2531 chars]
